Class FeedSynchronizationSyndicationExtensionContext

Encapsulates specific information about an individual FeedSynchronizationSyndicationExtension.

Sharing

Gets or sets information from a specific feed publisher to the specific feed consumer that requested the feed.

Declaration
public FeedSynchronizationSharingInformation Sharing { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
FeedSynchronizationSharingInformation

A FeedSynchronizationSharingInformation object that represents information from a specific feed publisher to the specific feed consumer that requested the feed. The default value is null.
| Improve this Doc View Source

Synchronization

Gets or sets the information required for synchronization.

Declaration
public FeedSynchronizationItem Synchronization { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
FeedSynchronizationItem

A Argotic.Extensions.Core.FeedSynchronizationSyndicationExtensionContext.synchronizationItem object that represents the information required for synchronization.
Remarks

This is required of all items in all feeds wishing to participate in FeedSync-based synchronization. Since FeedSynchronizationSharingInformation is not required, feed consumers must consider the presence of FeedSynchronizationItem in items or entries as an indication that the feed contains sync data.

It acceptable for a feed to have some items or entries with FeedSynchronizationItem elements, and some without a FeedSynchronizationItem. Only the items and entries that include the FeedSynchronizationItem element participate in FeedSync synchronization.

Load(XPathNavigator, XmlNamespaceManager)

Initializes the syndication extension context using the supplied System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.

Declaration
public bool Load(XPathNavigator source, XmlNamespaceManager manager)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator source

The XPathNavigator used to load this FeedSynchronizationSyndicationExtensionContext.
System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager manager

The System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager object used to resolve prefixed syndication extension elements and attributes.
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

true if the FeedSynchronizationSyndicationExtensionContext was able to be initialized using the supplied source; otherwise false.
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The source is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.ArgumentNullException

The manager is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
